title: Digilogue Watch Face
summary: Fully customisable, minimal design, analogue and digital display
description: Digilogue Watch face for Android Wear 5+Temporary workaround for getting the weather to work if your device is running Android 6 (Marshmallow):Follow these steps to enable location permission for digilogue:- Open "Settings" app- go to "Apps"/"Applications"- in the menu, choose "Configure apps"- Tap on "App permissions"- Tap on "Location"- find "Digilogue" and enable itFeatures:- Full customisation in Companion setting screen (toggle display and the colour of all elements)- "Floating" Analogue watch hands- AM/PM mode- Shortened day of the week (in your language) and date- Moto 360 compatibility mode for the sensor bar- Battery indicator- Weather indicator and temperature (powered by World Weather Online) ** Please give the weather service some time to initialise the first time **- Weather updates occur every 3 hours, if the screen is on. If the screen is off at the next update time, it will only update the weather when the screen is powered on again.- Dial numbers for the analogue face- Preview of the watch face in companion app, tabbed layout for the settings
descriptionHTML:
Digilogue Watch face for Android Wear 5+

Temporary workaround for getting the weather to work if your device is running Android 6 (Marshmallow):

Follow these steps to enable location permission for digilogue:
- Open "Settings" app
- go to "Apps"/"Applications"
- in the menu, choose "Configure apps"
- Tap on "App permissions"
- Tap on "Location"
- find "Digilogue" and enable it


Features:
- Full customisation in Companion setting screen (toggle display and the colour of all elements)
- "Floating" Analogue watch hands
- AM/PM mode
- Shortened day of the week (in your language) and date
- Moto 360 compatibility mode for the sensor bar
- Battery indicator
- Weather indicator and temperature (powered by World Weather Online) ** Please give the weather service some time to initialise the first time **
- Weather updates occur every 3 hours, if the screen is on. If the screen is off at the next update time, it will only update the weather when the screen is powered on again.
- Dial numbers for the analogue face
- Preview of the watch face in companion app, tabbed layout for the settings
comments: Great face! Easy on battery life...I wish for more color options like orange & yellow
Nicely made A nice analogue face with digital time, date, battery, and card previews.

Prevents burn in Just switched from G Watch to the G Watch R and i have to say temporary burn in was an issue with stock watch faces. Switched to this watch face and never switched to others. Perhaps on the next update, the size of the analogue line to be different when on and ambient mode? Thicker when on and thin on ambient would be useful
Didn't show up Downloaded but could never find the face. EDIT: I uninstalled it and reinstalled it and now it works fine. Just the watch face I wanted
Minimalist One of the best minimalist watch faces to have.
recentChanges: - Tweaked spacing in companion settings page
- Hour ticks in Ambient mode now optional
- Preview of watch face and tabbed layout for companion app
- Analogue and Digital element size sliders
- Dial numbers for the analogue face
